alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 02 at 2:44PM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Hot Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior with any new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zone 289. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * WIND: Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the lower 90s.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
